EmailTemplate.name: Get Help Submission Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Get Help Request {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.CreatedBy} ,
Thank you for letting us know you are experiencing a problem with {!Case.Subject}. Your request for assistance has been received by our Interact Channel Enablement team and we will make every effort to address and resolve your issue as soon as possible.
Sincerely,
NCR Interact Partner Program Team
